QAPair.Question: Do you have information about Breast reconstruction - natural tissue
QAPair.Answer: After a mastectomy , some women choose to have surgery to remake their breast. This type of surgery is called breast reconstruction. It can be performed at the same time as a mastectomy (immediate reconstruction) or later (delayed reconstruction). During breast reconstruction that uses natural tissue, the breast is reshaped using muscle, skin, or fat from another part of your body.
